actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The wolf exhales frost in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw  taking 18 (4d8) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolfs allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in snow.
